attributes.action: campaign all media outlets to promote positive images of young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young People are constantly labeled as thugs, hoodies and yobs by local and national media outlets including Newspapers, Television & Radio. This petition is to help those young people who just get on with their lives without violence and those who choose to make a positive contribution within their communities but receive no press coverage.
